author: costin
msg: authMethod, formLoginPage, formErrorPage are all properties of Context,

author: shemnon
msg: Changed handling of parsing tags so that "<bogus: " will not bomb
the parser so long as parser is not a registered taglib prefix

author: costin
msg: - The ajp23 connector is now in native/apache/connector,
- The new AJP11 for netscape and IIS  in iis_netscape.
We need to add Unix makefiles too, and move the binaries out of the CVS
( we can put pre-compiled binaries in jakarta.apache.org/builds )

author: costin
msg: Added SimpleStartup.java, for people embeding tomcat in other applications
You can use the core api to add connectors, interceptors, etc - if you don't
